file_content.text: T7 = do anything for Jedi // T7 + Jedi = best friends
Jedi + lightsaber = champion
Jedi = T7's hero
Master Orgus = close // Enemy life-forms = closer
T7 = show Jedi the way to Forge
Jedi = contact A-4PO // Jedi + T7 = need data on Forge
T7 = power failure? // Memory logs = missing time
Bengel Morr took my Master someplace called the Forge. Do you know where that is?
Twi'lek life-forms = deceased // Jedi = explain?
These Twi'leks deactivated you and tried to kill me. I had to defend us.
They betrayed us, T7.
Jedi = saved T7 from memory wipe // T7 = grateful
Master Orgus needs our help. We need to find him.
No time for explanations.
Flesh Raiders stormed in and slaughtered everyone. I barely drove them off.
[Lie] Flesh Raiders did it.
Jedi = unable to save Twi'lek life-forms? // Logic circuits = unable to resolve
Forge = restricted access // T7 = no data on location
Jedi Archive Droid A-4PO = detailed data on Forge
Jedi = contact A-4PO via holo // A-4PO = transmit Forge data to T7
Jedi = know Master Orgus's location? // T7 = unable to find him
T7 = needs clear path for maximum scan // Jedi = only hope
T7 + Jedi prison breakout = exciting
T7 = happy to serve Jedi Order
